name: Defolty Doll Hat[1] Blueprint
description: Huge popularity! Headwear made according to Kafra's Defolty. Fascinated by Defolty's smile, many people like to use Kafra's Storage all day long.

name: Demon Eyepatch
description: The information leaked out of the eyes will often become a deadly weapon for the enemy to defeat you. Even a smile will become very evil after wearing a Demon Eyepatch, so the eyepatch are very popular in the evil country.

name: Desert Picnic Pad
description: A picnic pad with the style and design of the desert. You can almost feel the enthusiasm of the desert when using it.

name: Desert Prince
description: Headscarf imported from the hottest desert country in the world. It's said a brave prince might have worn this headscarf before.

name: Desert Prince [1]
description: Headscarf imported from the hottest desert country in the world. It's said a brave prince might have worn this headscarf before.

name: Desert Prince [1] Blueprint
description: Headscarf imported from the hottest desert country in the world. It's said a brave prince might have worn this headscarf before.

name: Desert Twilight [1]
description: Knives made by the Assassin Union.

name: Desert Twilight [2]
description: Knives made by the Assassin Union.

name: Destroyer Shard
description: Shard of the legendary artifact: Destroyer. By collecting rare materials and more debris, with ancient knowledge and legendary Mr. Dragon's skills, you may restore it to the original form.

name: Devil Cat
description: The devil cat has an unyielding will to not give in, wearing it will make you brave and tenacious.

name: Devil Cookie
description: The sweet deviruchi dessert can restore 180 to 240 Sp.

name: Devil Drooping Kitty
description: "Meow!" The cat meows softly, in fact, it may be cursing you... (How long have you not shampooed? Stinky!)

name: Devil Wing
description: The wings made by the Devil Soul. With it, the wearer can get terribly powerful, but the mind will be gradually eroded.

name: Devil Wing
description: The small wings of demon are similar to the bat's wings. Can be purchased from the collectors.

name: Devil Wing Blueprint
description: The wings made by the Devil Soul. With it, the wearer can get terribly powerful, but the mind will be gradually eroded.

name: Devil Wing Blueprint
description: The small wings of demon are similar to the bat's wings. Can be purchased from the collectors.
